009package imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.ellipse.algebraic;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
012
013import java.util.Random;
014
015import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.Array2DRowRealMatrix;
016import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.ArrayRealVector;
017import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.DecompositionSolver;
018import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.LUDecomposition;
019import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix;
020import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector;
021import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.SingularMatrixException;
022
023import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
024import imagingbook.common.math.PrintPrecision;
025
026/**
027 * 
028 * @author WB
029 *
030 */
031public class EllipseFit5Points implements EllipseFitAlgebraic {
032        
033        private final double[] p;       // p = (A,B,C,D,E,F) ellipse parameters
034        
035        public EllipseFit5Points(Pnt2d[] points) {
036                this.p = fit(points);
037        }
038
039        @Override
040        public double[] getParameters() {
041                return this.p;
042        }
043        
044        private double[] fit(Pnt2d[] points) {
045                if (points.length < 5) {
046                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("5 points are needed for " + this.getClass().getSimpleName());
047                }
048                final int n = points.length;
049
050                // create design matrix X:
051                RealMatrix X = new Array2DRowRealMatrix(n, 5);
052                RealVector b = new ArrayRealVector(n);
053                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
054                        double x = points[i].getX();
055                        double y = points[i].getY();
056                        X.setEntry(i, 0, sqr(x) - sqr(y));
057                        X.setEntry(i, 1, x * y);
058                        X.setEntry(i, 2, x);
059                        X.setEntry(i, 3, y);
060                        X.setEntry(i, 4, 1);
061                        b.setEntry(i, - sqr(y));
062                }
063                
064//              System.out.println("X = \n" + Matrix.toString(X));
065//              System.out.println("b = " + Matrix.toString(b));
066                
067                LUDecomposition decomp = new LUDecomposition(X); 
068                // see https://commons.apache.org/proper/commons-math/userguide/linear.html
069                 
070                DecompositionSolver solver = decomp.getSolver();
071                RealVector x = null;
072                try {
073                        x = solver.solve(b);
074                } catch(SingularMatrixException e) { }
075
076                if (x == null) {
077                        return null;
078                }
079                
080                double A = x.getEntry(0);
081                double B = x.getEntry(1);
082                double C = 1 - A;
083                double D = x.getEntry(2);
084                double E = x.getEntry(3);
085                double F = x.getEntry(4);
086                
087                
088                boolean isEllipse = (4 * A * C - sqr(B)) > 0;
089                
090                if (isEllipse) {
091                        double[] p = {A,B,C,D,E,F};
092                        return p;
093                }
094                else {
095                        return null;
096                }
097                
098                /*
099                double[] p = {A,B,C,D,E,F};
100                System.out.println("p = " + Matrix.toString(p));
101                
102                
103                
104                if (isEllipse) {        
105                        AlgebraicEllipse ea = new AlgebraicEllipse(p);
106                        Ellipse eg = Ellipse.from(ea);
107                        System.out.println("P1: ellipse = " + eg);
108                }
109                else {
110                        System.out.println("P1: NO ellipse!");
111                }
112                
113                EllipseFitAlgebraic fit2 = new EllipseFitFitzgibbonStable(points);
114                double[] p2 = fit2.getParameters();
115                if (p2 == null) {
116                        System.out.println("P2: NULL ellipse!");
117                }
118                else {
119                        boolean isEllipse2 = (4 * p2[0] * p2[2] - sqr(p2[1])) > 0;
120                        System.out.println("P2: is ellipse = " +isEllipse2);
121                        if (isEllipse2) {
122                                Ellipse ell2 = Ellipse.from(fit2.getEllipse());
123                                System.out.println("P2: error = " + ell2.getError(points));
124                        }
125                        
126                }
127                System.out.println();
128                return p;
129                */
130        }
131        
132        public static void main(String[] args) {
133                PrintPrecision.set(9);
134                Pnt2d p0 = Pnt2d.from(40, 53);
135                Pnt2d p1 = Pnt2d.from(107, 20);
136                Pnt2d p2 = Pnt2d.from(170, 26);
137                Pnt2d p3 = Pnt2d.from(186, 55);
138                Pnt2d p4 = Pnt2d.from(135, 103);
139                
140                Pnt2d[] points = {p0, p1, p2, p3, p4};
141                EllipseFit5Points fit = new EllipseFit5Points(points);
142                System.out.println("fit ellipse = " + fit.getEllipse());
143                
144                Random rg = new Random();
145                
146                int N = 1000;
147                int nullCnt = 0;
148                for (int k = 0; k < N; k++) {
149                        for (int i = 0; i < points.length; i++) {
150                                double x = rg.nextInt(200);
151                                double y = rg.nextInt(200);
152                                points[i] = Pnt2d.from(x, y);
153                        }
154                        fit = new EllipseFit5Points(points);
155                        if (fit.getEllipse() == null) {
156                                nullCnt++;
157                        }
158//                      System.out.println("fit ellipse = " + fit.getEllipse());
159                        
160                }
161                
162                System.out.println("null count: " + nullCnt);
163        }
164}
